name: Blackout (itch) (WaveyDavey, LegacyView)
description:
After seeing your life flash before your eyes, survive on an island and escape by using experiences from your past. Your answers to the text story edit how you will survive the island.

To run the game, run the unity 

Controls:

Text Section: Left Click Answer 

Survival Section: W and D to move left or right, Q for hitting, E and R for placing/picking up blocks. C to craft.

  • Made in 3 days with Unity as a submission for Mini Jam 54: Memories
  • Creators: LegacyView , WaveyDavey and SquirrelNutkins
